item.title: Expressjs Multer File Upload
item.description: Expressjs + Multer for file upload. Usages: multer({ limits, fileFilter, storage }) creates Multer object for reusable in different requset handlers. limits limit fileSize, fieldName, etc… fileFilter custom file validation storage disk / memory / custom storage transform ([s3) multer().array('photos', 2) creates request handler for different routes. single one file upload, get by req.file array multiple files upload, get by req.files fields multiple field for files upload, get by req.files[<fieldName>][0] Example
